message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, could we aim for $13,800?
